text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
2500 Municipal Building
New York 7, New York
March 5, 1954
Mr. Frank Schooley
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
I am enclosing herewith an additional check of $1, 000 from the
Edward L. Bernays Foundation for, and in behalf of WNYC's
Educational Institute.
I hope that we are not giving you too much trouble in the adÂ¬
ministration of this accout and I certainly would appreciate
anything you can do to expedite the forwarding of checks
against the vouchers that have been transmitted.
With all best wishes, believe me.
sns/be
